sourcesContent:
import { Button, Form, FormControl, Nav, Navbar } from 'react-bootstrap'
import { connect } from 'react-redux'
import { push } from 'react-router-redux'
import React from 'react'

import Counter from '../../components/presentation/Counter'
import Logo from '../../components/shapes/Logo'

const MainMenu = ({ goTo, favoritesCount }) => (
	<Navbar bg="dark" variant="dark">
		<Navbar.Brand onClick={() => goTo('/')}>
			<Logo />
		</Navbar.Brand>
		<Nav className="mr-auto">
			<Nav.Link onClick={() => goTo('/')}>Pokemons</Nav.Link>

			<Counter key={3} value={favoritesCount || 2}>
				<Nav.Link onClick={() => goTo('/')}>Favoritos</Nav.Link>
			</Counter>
		</Nav>
		<Form inline>
			<FormControl type="text" placeholder="Search" className="mr-sm-2" />
			<Button variant="outline-info">Search</Button>
		</Form>
	</Navbar>
)

const mapState = state => ({
	favoritesCount: state.favoritePokemons.list.length
})

const mapActions = d => ({
	goTo(path) {
		d(push(path))
	}
})

export default connect(mapState, mapActions)(MainMenu)
